Travels Nepal September 2011 Kathmandu to Syabrubesi by Bus

Kathmandu to Syabrubesi by Bus

Ducking under branches and prayer flags, riding on top of a bus with a 700m drop on the left and jungle, villages and waterfalls on the right. This is Nepal. Our trip to Syabrubesi was certainly exciting. Once we had to get out and walk because it was too exciting for the bus to make it through the land slides.

  • Here's a section of the road that is being rebuilt as it had been washed away in the rain. We had to get out and walk through here.
